greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n, m), denominators of coefficients in a power/Fourier series expansion of the plane pendulum's exact phase space trajectory.
comment: Triangle read by rows ( see example ). The numerator triangle is A274076.

Comments of A273506 give a definition of the fraction triangle, which determines an arbitrary-precision solution to the simple pendulum equations of motion. For more details see "Plane Pendulum and Beyond by Phase Space Geometry" (Klee, 2016).
link: Bradley Klee, Plane Pendulum and Beyond by Phase Space Geometry, arXiv:1605.09102 [physics.class-ph], 2016.
mathematica: R[n_] := Sqrt[4 k] Plus[1, Total[k^# R[#, Q] & /@ Range[n]]]
Function[{rules}, Nest[Rule[#[[1]], ReplaceAll[#[[2]], rules]] & /@ # &, rules, n]][
results.author: _Bradley Klee_, May 23 2016
